content:
path /v3/one/block/current
operationid onegetcurrentblock
summary get current block number
description 1 credit per api call
get one current block number this is the number of the latest block in the blockchain
responses
200
schema
type array
oneblockcurrent
type object
properties
shardid
type number
description shard id
blocknumber
type number
description current block number in this shard
description ok
tag_summary:
harmonyone is an oneeum l2 scaling solution 100 evm compatible and is very good for decentralized application dapp development within many possible verticals including defi nft gaming and many others
tatum supports 2 chains
mainnet  a regular live chain
testnet  a chain used for testing purposes coins on the test chain have no value and can be obtained from
a faucet eg https//faucetpopsone/
title: 25_Harmony_OneGetCurrentBlock_252.json
